org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic
Class CaptureBusinessLogic

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic.AbstractBusinessLogic
      org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic.CaptureBusinessLogic
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICaptureResource
public class CaptureBusinessLogic
extends AbstractBusinessLogic
implements ICaptureResource

This class is a simulator that can be used to capture events, i.e. to send them to the EPCIS capture interface.

Author:
Mathias Mueller mathias.mueller(at)unifr.ch, Dominique Guinard
